text: Uye vaurayei pose pamunovawana, uyezve vadzingei uko kwavakudzingai, uye Al-Fitnah (Miedzo) yakanyanya kuipa kudarika kuuraya. Uye musava munorwa navo muAl-Masjid Al- Haraam (Nzvimbo tsvene iri kuMakkah), kunze kwekuti ivo vatanga kukurwisai mairi. Asi kana vakurwisai, nokudaro vaurayei. Uyu ndiwo mugove wevasingatendi
